Name: CrystalKeepers
About the game: CrystalKeepers plunges you into a world invaded by monsters of all kinds. Crystals are your only defense. To win, you will have to protect them by all possible means. Before facing hordes of enemies and bosses, prepare yourself by exploring, collecting resources, building your weapons and defenses. Each game played will allow you to unlock new content or bonuses. Main Features : - A very (cartoon) animated universe - A dozen classes of heroes with their own gameplays (in final version) - A dozen levels with their unique characteristics (in final version) - Collect resources and equipment for your characters - Build your defense base and arsenal But don't forget: the real hero is the crystal!
